Related ResearchÂ¶

Machine learning for perturbational single-cell omics.
scGen predicts single-cell perturbation responses.
Cell type prioritization in single-cell data.
Generative modeling of single-cell time series with PRESCIENT enables prediction of cell trajectories with interventions.
muscat detects subpopulation-specific state transitions from multi-sample multi-condition single-cell transcriptomics data.
scCODA: A Bayesian model for compositional single-cell data analysis.
Milo: differential abundance testing on single-cell data using k-NN graphs.
